channel.title: Road to 99 strength || Other skills later on
channel.description:
Well, to prove elve age wrong. [quote="the elve age, post:8, topic:448456"]Finish this, no one ever finishes their roads to whatever, EXCEPT David.[/quote]
Goal #1 99 Magic: Completed.
Goal #2 Barrows Gloves: Completed.
Goal #3 99 Strength: Current level: 91 [Updated 7/16/2012]
Progress Report: I make about 60k/hr due to the high amount of bots at armoured zombies.

item.title: Road to 99 strength || Other skills later on
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

It is pretty fun, other than having to do like 40 other quests to get to finish this.

I’m in the process of doing Underground Pass so I can start legends quest (finally) ^.^

Read full topic

item.title: Road to 99 strength || Other skills later on
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:29, topic:448629”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=551525.msg4042972#msg4042972 date=1341812768]

Good luck. I did cammy teleport to 80, then alched to 86, then planked maked to 94. Now I may get 99.

alched pretty much all the way to 96, almost 97. I’m unsure if I’ll be able to pull my goal, I’d have to get a double exp weekend in order to reach it
[/quote]Why’s that do you not have enough cash?

not enough time. Making about 68k exp/hr
1 hour, 15 minutes left until 12:00 AM, 140k exp off of 97 o.O

Don’t see why you have to push yourself to that goal, take your time.[/quote]
nothing better to do recently, which is why I’m doing it

Read full topic

item.title: Road to 99 strength || Other skills later on
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:21, topic:448629”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=551525.msg4042091#msg4042091 date=1341730530]

Dude.
You’re sitting in soul wars, you’re botting.
It’s not that hard to bot halfway to a 99 in a non-random event location, lol.

yeah totally, I’ll make a thread to post my progress towards a 99 that I’m not even working on, Great idea.

If I was botting, I would have the common knowledge to not post a thread about it to “brag” about by “earned” 99. Great idea man. great idea.

Just because I don’t stand in the g.e to alch doesn’t mean I’m an automatic botter. Also, people in soul wars actually communicate without being assholes to eachother because we share a common goal.
[/quote]
You’ve posted about botting before lmao, don’t lie.
As if jagex gives a flying fuck either?[/quote]
yes I have botted before. I came out and said I have, I’ve botted fishing at monkfish, and attempted to bot thieving except I found no bots for it.

Fishing still took 3 months, all in all, I probably botted 1 month of that, which was like level 94-97 pretty much.

Clicking one area while watching tv isn’t that hard.

Read full topic
